title: Print, "Plate in Vasses de la Maison Royalle de L'oo Nouvellement (Vessels of the Royal House of L'oo)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower right: inventé et gravé par D. Marot.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, lower left: Avec Privilege des Etats Generaux.
dimensions:
Sheet: 35 x 23.5 cm (13 3/4 x 9 1/4 in.)
Platemark: 25.7 x 20.3 cm (10 1/8 in. x 8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Footed vessel decorated with crowned escutcheon at center, surrounded by robed figures holding drapery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Plate in Vasses de la Maison Royalle de L'oo Nouvellement (Vessels of the Royal House of L'oo)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-35.
